name: Watermark
description: If enabled, a watermark will rest in the bottom left corner of your screen

name: Combo sound effect
description: If enabled, a sound effect will play when you get a combo

name: Damage screen rotation
description: If enabled, the screen will rotate when you take damage / miss a note

name: Damage sound
description: If enabled, a sound will play when you take damage / miss a note

description: This is a test bool option

name: Test String Option
description: This is a test string option
